CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 23, 1946, pg. 21, reads: "Discusses Play - Henry Scott, one of the leading players in 'Deep Are the Roots,' now playing at the Nixon Theatre, explained the importance of the drama at the Centre Avenue YMCA luncheon-forum Wednesday. Seated is George F. Brown, theatrical writer for The Courier. Frances Waller and Jessie Grayson also gave talks, but were absent when the picture was taken. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Actor Henry Scott speaking behind banquet table, with Pittsburgh Courier journalist George Brown seated beside him, in Centre Avenue YMCA with Jacob Lawrence print from John Brown series on wall
